column2: lets talk about the food. We had a table of 4 and we looked at previous Yelpers' reviews already about the food and a lot of folks recommended the Dry Aged Bone In Ribeye. We got two orders of that (the 42-day dry aged 22 oz bone-in ribeye) and added a Roasted Bone Marrow to each ribeye. As for sides
column3: we all decided to share the Truffle Mac & Cheese
column5: and the Creamy Spinach (or something of that nature). All of the sides were delicious
column6: but probably the best food item of the night was the RIBEYE itself.
